backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blog posts with create, fetch, list, and search functions stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file describing a new Welcome section with Bengali text and listing related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summarized descriptions of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes plus global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full crawling and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing URLs for home, blog, about, and five blog posts with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Documentation explaining how and when to update the sitemap file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for home, blog list, blog post, and about pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Card component showing a blog post’s title, date, excerpt, and link to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with background image, large heading, description, and links to blog and about pages.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Welcome section displaying a styled block of Bengali introductory text.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Mobile slide‑in menu with scroll lock, close button, navigation links, and help links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with about info, navigation links, help links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, desktop navigation, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including background, header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Styled placeholder component representing different ad slot variants.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads an Adsterra script once and renders its banner container.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Card-style placeholder for affiliate product recommendations.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title, meta tags, and canonical URL for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: React-query hooks for fetching posts, single posts, and searching posts with fallback data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, and global background/overlay styling including responsive parallax images.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides fallback sample blog posts to display when the backend has no data or is unreachable.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a list of admin help links with labels and URLs.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site metadata including name, description, URL, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with biography, expertise sections, contact details, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading and error states plus ads and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Renders an individual blog post with SEO tags, content, ads, affiliate sections, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero sections, feature highlights, ads, and SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system via CSS variables, extended themes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state description detailing site features, design goals, issues, and architectural notes for a responsive neon‑styled website with ads and Bengali welcome section.
